main_definition: Major League Soccer (MLS) refers to the top professional soccer league in the United States, while as an acronym it can also represent several other unrelated terms.

meanings_and_examples.example: The New York Red Bulls compete in MLS.
An investor may track the market level stock prices to make informed decisions on buying or selling shares.
After completing her course, Jane is now working as a Medical Laboratory Scientist in a renowned hospital.
The train uses MLS technology to float above the tracks without touching them, reducing friction and increasing efficiency.
